name: Learn to play the guitar
description: Learn to play the guitar to be able to play songs. If this goal is not achieved, I will miss out on the joy of creating music and potentially performing for others, leading to regret and a feeling of unfulfilled potential.

name: Learn to play the guitar
description: Practice guitar for 30 minutes every day. Consequence of failure: my fingers will lose their calluses and I'll have to start from scratch, causing immense pain and suffering.
